incident.title: MySQL Connection Pool Exhausted
incident.description: MySQL connection pool has no available connections. Timeout after 30 seconds.

incident.title: Spark Driver OutOfMemory
incident.description: Spark driver process failed with java.lang.OutOfMemoryError during large dataset processing

incident.title: ETL Pipeline Stuck
incident.description: Airflow DAG 'daily-etl-pipeline' has been running for 3 hours without progress

incident.title: Data File Missing
incident.description: Required input file data/sales/2024-01-15.csv not found for processing job

incident.title: Load Balancer Health Check Failed
incident.description: Health check failing for backend service. All instances marked unhealthy.

incident.title: Kubernetes Pod CrashLoopBackOff
incident.description: Pod web-service-7f8b9d-xyz in CrashLoopBackOff state. Container exits with code 1.

incident.title: Cache Miss Rate High
incident.description: Redis cache miss rate at 85% for user session data. Performance degraded.

incident.title: Database Query Timeout
incident.description: PostgreSQL query taking >60 seconds on users table. Lock detected.

incident.title: Executor Lost in Spark Job
incident.description: YARN killed Spark executor due to memory usage exceeding 8GB limit

incident.title: Sensor Data Stream Interrupted
incident.description: IoT sensor data stream from factory floor stopped 2 hours ago. No data received.
